experience: You and Petrina both know Bernard Ong, Jennifer Bookspan, and 15 others
November 1st already...  Where did the year go?
It’s probably something most of us say every year, but this year feels different.
Coterie is approaching the one year anniversary of our start-up.
While new ventures can feel lonely at times, this one did not.
Our supportive and close relationships within the benefits industry helped to create short product development cycles.
We successfully launched StuLo Financial Wellness (https://StuLoWellness.com) and the Fundamental Care Benefits Marketplace (https://lnkd.in/gxvm4jP).
The market reception for our relevant and meaningful programs has been amazing.
Thank you industry friends (our coterie) for everything you did and are doing to help us in 2017.
Time flies when you’re having fun…
Practical Tips for Finding The Way In: Anna’s Job Search Story

Oversee all aspects of  business including sales, operations, customer service, IT, marketing and product development.  Work with clients to create customized solution proposals and ensure proper solution development, installation, and follow-up.  Interface with investors to forecast ROI.•	Decreased operating costs by $750,000 in by optimizing client and partner portfolios.•	Achieved 46% revenue increase in first year with new marketing approach including reselling partner products and bundling of products. •	Realized a 30% improvement in forecasting accuracy by driving sales readiness and developing a distribution framework utilized for cross selling resulting in multi-dimensional client relationships. •	Decreased corporate costs by developing repeatable client onboarding procedures to ensure full accountability of internal staff with new clients. •	Increased throughput by 300% in six months without increasing headcount through automation, process improvement and cross training. •	Established and launched a Business Intelligence product to add value to client relationships, and expand revenue through additional channels.•	Created consumer engagement technology, allowing carriers and brokers to directly interface with consumers based on lifecycle triggers improving customer acquisition and retention.•	Implemented new software development lifecycle transitioning from Waterfall to Agile. •	Rapidly increased revenue generation by decreasing sales cycle by five months.•	Promoted due to success of delivering strategic market approaches, resulting in growth, and tactically advancing operations.
Built company from entry  level to thriving 2 acre boarding and training operations.  Responsible for marketing, budgeting, growth and expansion planning and overall financial wellness.

Recruited to manage the operations, drive efficiencies, enhance product quality and improve customer service.  Streamlined operations and improved all SLA's, improved scalability and improved response time significantly.•	Eliminated customer attrition and retained 100% of existing customer base by implementing a customer satisfaction program focused on quality, timeliness and incremental value.  •	Streamlined all customer service SLAs through improved training, systematic automations, and process improvements.  Improved overall response time from five business days to one day. •	Redesigned IT structure from the ground up including governance processes, lifecycle and release management and quality assurance program. •	Achieved SSAE 16 Certification by identifying and mitigating risks and standardizing operational processes.

Implemented voice of customer methodologies to centralize and streamline processes for shared services and call center organizations in a global environment.  Improved satisfaction globally while simultaneously reducing operating costs.•	Realized 1,200 bps improvement in 18 months by spearheading a domestic customer satisfaction program. Expanded program to Canada and Mexico over the following year, resulting in 1,800 bps improvements; expanded globally over the following 3 years, due to program success.•	Reduced costs by over $5 million by creating a global strategy to evaluate each country’s servicing approach, prioritizing largest opportunities, improving system responsiveness and increasing customer satisfaction in 22 of 23 countries.•	Reduced technology spending over $3 million after centralizing fragmented systems and developing policies and procedures to streamline processes.

Designed and implemented cross-organizational strategies to optimize servicing solutions for small business card holders.  Developed segmented servicing strategies that drove revenue and increased card holder loyalty.•	Enhanced department productivity improving onboarding and training processes through automation, decreasing ramp-up time for new hires from four months to five weeks.•	Realized 40% spend growth over 2 years and a 10–12% year over year growth by maximizing portfolio management, implementing servicing strategies leveraging detailed analytics.•	Decreased handling time by 10-second average; increased customer service ratings; improved training resulting in higher performing agents and improved employee attrition.

Trina Thompson stands out as an exceptional, human-centered senior executive from the hundreds I’ve worked closely with over the past 30 years.  I’ve experienced her rare blend of insightful leadership, instinct, strategic thinking, clear communication and enormous capacity for work, while serving as a consulting partner to her at Genuis Avenue.  She combines vision with process optimization skills, change management expertise and superior emotional intelligence, all of which enable her to build productive relationships, accelerate change and motivate teams to excel. Trina's skillful use of inquiry, decisiveness and ability to assimilate information help her get traction quickly and solve problems efficiently. She is a smart, high energy, high achieving executive with a breadth of experience and level of productivity you rarely find in one individual.

Barbara Timbers-Purcell
IT Leader, Project Manager focused on application development, BI and process improvements
June 26, 2017, Barbara reported directly to Petrina

I have had the honor to work with Trina for the past 3 years at Genius Avenue, as the president and my direct manager. Trina is one of the most intelligent people I have met. She amazes me with her ability to understand all areas of the business, both high and detailed level, paired with an intuitiveness to quickly know at what level her team needs her. Working with Trina has simply been fun. She brings her mind and energy to every encounter to drive her team to do their best, think strategically and address all the details. She has helped me solve countless problems in the IT department, as we transformed the company to follow best practices and repeatable processes. The most impressive trait of Trina’s is her humanness. She sincerely cares about the individuals on her team and works to understand how to engage them to grow in their role. I left every meeting with Trina equipped with new creative ideas and inspiration to move our initiatives forward.  Status quo and stagnation are not options with her leadership.

Ben Rozum
Founder | Insurance | Employee Benefits | Financial Wellness
June 21, 2017, Ben managed Petrina directly

Trina is one of the best hiring decisions that I have ever made in my career. As the founder of Genius Avenue and at a time when our organization was young and experiencing significant growing pains, I had the fortune of bringing on Trina to be part of my executive leadership team. As COO and then President, she confidently took ownership in running our operations and brought much needed structure and a disciplined process-driven approach to improve our efficiency and optimize our client experience. She is the best I have ever seen in her ability to build and lead the execution of a strategic plan. What has always impressed me the most about Trina is the effectiveness of her leadership style. She creates a culture of accountability and has the ability to connect with her employees to build trusting relationships. She treats everyone with respect and genuinely cares about helping to guide her team through personal and professional growth. Her dedication, commitment, and loyalty are evidenced through her work-ethic and through the results of the team and company that she leads.  I am proud to have been on the same team with Trina and learned a lot from her in my own professional development.

Amy Aines
Founder and CEO, Damianakes Communications - Culture Building , Employer Branding and Leadership Communications
October 5, 2017, Petrina was a client of Amy’s

There are not many people in business who can truly listen and capture not only what is said but also the nuances that may not be known or not be said and capitalize on both...Amy does this elegantly.  She can listen like no other and rapidly turn around the most poignent observations and statements that others don't arrive at.. and that's where the value lies.  She pulls from years of hands on expertise as well as her network of possibilities to find solutions to the challenges of today's business.  I consider her my secret weapon.. my trusted advisor.. my expert sounding board and she has come through for me EVERY TIME.  Her depth of experience and unique ability for listening has been a differentiator for me.Amy supported me in many capacities as my trusted advisor helping to shape organizational culture-draft communications and develop frameworks that supported growth and innovation mindsets within my organization.

VP Finance Operations at Genius Avenue
August 2, 2017, Petrina managed Agustin directly

Agustin is a brilliant financial mind.  He is able to work across all aspects on financial elements that an organization requires and has been exceptional in driving substantial improvements along the way.  Agustin is a solid people leader that inspires excellence in his people and grows their talents.  He expects brilliance from himself and from his team mates.  Agustin is also very skilled at building models that help articulate the business in current as well as future scenarios.  These models help to better forecast projections required to understand as a business evolves and what levers can be adjusted to quickly accomplish goals.  I loved working with Agustin and would welcome the opportunity to work with him in the future.

summary: Business and operations leader with over 20 years of experience leveraging experience to direct large, cross-functional teams including operations, sales, IT, and marketing.  Talent for identifying meaningful market research to advance product offering and refine sales processes to improve profits and decrease cost. Areas of expertise include business negotiations, scaling an organization, developing global shared services and bridging gaps between technology and operations. Core competencies include:  · Strategic Planning & Execution	   · Organizational Efficiency	                · Product Development· Profit & Loss Forecasting	                   · Risk Management & Mitigation	· Cost Containment· Team Leadership & Management	   · Cash Flow Optimization	                · Agile / Six Sigma / PDLC
